thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com | 3 of 105
thread.title: James Milner

author: James Milner
title: James Milner
text: I have been using OFX (formerly UKForex) for some time now and have been extremely impressed. Whether using the online system or calling in, my money transfers have been fast and efficient and I am confident of getting a good and competitive rate. I recomend OFX to anyone needing money transfer services whether changing large or small denominations. Another useful feature is their daily commentary on the markets which I get as an email.
